Champaign.Centennial Park (Champaign, Illinois): Located in the western part of Champaign, Illinois, Centennial Park is the second largest park operated by the Champaign Park District. Land for the park was acquired in 1959 for an estimated cost of about $161,800. Since its acquisition of the land, the park district exchanged 5 acres (2.0 ha) of the park to Champaign Unit 4 School District in return for the land for Morrisey Park.
